# Methods

In this prospective singlecenter observational study we collected
`r nrow(agc)` consecutive anaesthetic gas canisters from
`r paste(format(range(c(agc$Start, agc$End)), "%B %Y"), collapse = " to ")`.

The Ethics Committee at the University Medicine Greifswald
approved this study (reference number: BB 102/23).
